DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , adaptive-design , single-dose , non randomize PET occupancy study.The primary aim study describe relationship plasma concentration brain occupancy GSK1018921 time . Up 22 healthy volunteer administer single dos GSK1018921 order obtain 12 evaluable complete data set occupancy estimate .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male subject Age : 1855 year No history physical , neurological mental illness Exclusion criterion History claustrophobia inability lie still PET camera least 2 hour Cardiac pacemaker metal implant body contraindicate MRI scan .
